General.Name: Artemis Medicare Services Limited
General.Description: Artemis Medicare Services Limited engages in the management and operation of multi specialty hospitals in India and internationally. The company offers medical and surgical intervention; and inpatient and outpatient services. It also operates Artemis Hospital, a multi-specialty hospital located in Gurugram. The company provides billing and insurance, care pages, child care, emotional and support programs, health services, international patient services, medical interpreter and records services, mind body medicine, nursing, nutrition, patient and family advisory, patient advocacy and portal, pre-admission testing, and smoking cessation programs services. It offers workplace clinics for counseling; outpatient and hospitalization services; healthcare education and awareness programs; first aid and BLS training; emergency services; and organizational healthcare audit services. Artemis Medicare Services Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Gurugram, India.
